product_name: ProGold Xtreme Chain Lube - 4 fl. oz.
long_description: ProGold Xtreme chain lube is formulated for long distance road and off-road rides with demanding conditions, no matter the weather or terrain. Formula combines metal friction reducer technology with carriers that stubbornly stick to the chain, even in the worst weather, improving drivetrain performance and longevity. Resists build-up and tackiness to minimize premature wear. In addition, the ProGold Xtreme chain lube sheds water, cleans and lubricates while you ride. 4 fl. oz.
short_description: ProGold Xtreme chain lube is formulated for long distance road and off-road rides with demanding conditions, no matter the weather or terrain.
